attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scotland,Ireland and Wales have all recieved a degree of independance from the british Parliment.The people of ENGLAND are also entitled to make independant decisions in the same way regarding English affairs.This is not intended to undermine the british parliment as cohesion of all four contries is the strength of britain and is needed to be supported.United we stand devided we fall,But only by the agreement of each country can Britain move forward and work within the european union.
